channel.title: Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: No longer prolific
item.description:
I am no longer a prolific blogger, as the last of these posts was a month ago.

Don’t get me wrong, I like the idea of blogging, it’s just that it takes a certain set of devotional habits to keep it going. Devotion like writing without an editor, for an uncertain audience, and without expectation of getting any compensation for it. All perfectly fine reasons to write, but not all that are easy to sustain.

You can only do so many things, and when it comes to writing, I find myself writing more for internal use to document a system that’s under development or to encourage myself to get some unpleasant task done. The era of writing for a general audience seems to be over.
